ImageBallView - Class in project.chenlin_17.Views
This image ball class is the concrete class extends from the ball class.
It creates the ball with set image.

This constructor initializes the ball view.

This image ball class is the concrete class extends from the ball class.

ImagePaddleView(PaddleModel, Rectangle, Image, Group) - Constructor for class project.chenlin_17.Views.ImagePaddleView
This constructor creates the regular paddle type, whose viewing is expected to be a rectangle with an image attaches to it.
impact() - Method in class project.chenlin_17.Views.Brick
This function sets the impact of the ball hitting the ball.
After impact, the current strength of the brick should minus itself by one and if the current strength drops to 0, sets the broken status of the brick to true (broken).
impact() - Method in class project.chenlin_17.Views.SteelBrick
This function sets the steel bricks' broken condition.
It only breaks randomly using the possibility.
impact(BallView) - Method in class project.chenlin_17.Views.PaddleView
This function simulates paddle's interaction with the ball.
impactBorder() - Method in class project.chenlin_17.Views.World
This function reflects boarder's impact on the ball.
impactWall() - Method in class project.chenlin_17.Views.World
This function reflects the ball's impact on the wall.
